name: APPLICANT_NOTICE_OF_PROCEEDINGS
body:
Reference no: ((reference number))

Dear ((applicant name)),

Your application has passed checks by court staff and a copy of the application has been sent to ((respondent name)) along with a form called an ‘acknowledgement of service.’

 #What happens next

((respondent name)) has 7 days from receipt of the letter to respond to the application. If you don’t hear anything after 30 days from the date of this notification, sign into your account to find out what you can do next:

https://www.gov.uk/apply-for-divorce

This is an automated message, please don’t reply to this email.

# HM Courts & Tribunals Service

Phone: 0300 303 0642

Hours: 8.30am to 5pm, Monday to Friday, Saturday 8am to 2pm

Find out about call charges: https://www.gov.uk/call-charges

Email: divorcecase@justice.gov.uk

Please help us improve this service by leaving your feedback at http://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/8RR1T?pageurl=/email.
subject: Your application has been sent out (issued)
